sect1.title: {php}
sect1.para: The {php} tags allow PHP code to be embedded directly into the template. They will not be escaped, regardless of the $php_handling setting. This is for advanced users only, not normally needed and not recommended.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: To access PHP variables in {php} blocks you will need to use the PHP global keyword.
